channel.title: Tuttle on Wheeler Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Tuttle on Wheeler Genealogy

item.title: Carra Inez (Tuttle) Wheeler: Vermont Roots, Connecticut Years, Holyoke Home
item.description: Born in Windsor County, Vermont, Carra Inez Tuttle married John Edward Wheeler and raised a family through Connecticut before returning to Holyoke, Massachusetts.

item.title: From Farm to Storefront: Augustus Tuttle and the A. & O. S. Tuttle Store
item.description: A census snapshot shows Augustus Tuttle as a young farmer in Vermont, but later evidence points to a family business: a Cavendish general store that became a Holyoke dry-goods operation.

item.title: Carra Inez Tuttle (52 Ancestors; #6 Carra Inez Tuttle
item.description: As I have stated previously, I am fortunate enough to be surrounded by photos of my ancestors. One such ancestor that I was introduced to at a relatively young age due to photos in our home was my great grandmother, Carra Inez (nee Tuttle) Wheeler. Carra Inez Tuttle was born 27 Jul 1856 in Cavendish, Vermont to Augustus Tuttle and Elsie Robinson. While Carra was born in Cavendish, Vermont we find that Carra and her family were in Holyoke, Massachusetts by 1863 where Carra’s father owned a store.

item.title: Carra Inez Tuttle (52 Ancestors; #6 Carra Inez Tuttle
item.description: As I have stated previously, I am fortunate enough to be surrounded by photos of my ancestors. One such ancestor that I was introduced to at a relatively young age due to photos in our home was my great grandmother, Carra Inez (nee Tuttle) Wheeler. Carra Inez Tuttle was born 27 Jul 1856 in Cavendish, Vermont to Augustus Tuttle and Elsie Robinson. While Carra was born in Cavendish, Vermont we find that Carra and her family were in Holyoke, Massachusetts by 1863 where Carra’s father owned a store.
